location: Montgomery County, Maryland / Washington, D.C. Area
summary: To maximize my exceptional management, retail, business banking and analytical talent, in a capacity that presents sales development and project management opportunities.

experience.title: Senior Commercial Business Banking Relationship Manager, VP
experience.description: Responsible for generating and managing profitable loans and deposit portfolios and non-interest income from businesses with annual sales of $1MM-$50MM; manages assigned loan portfolio; develops and retains long-term profitable client relationships; generates new fee-based revenue from credit and non-credit products; services commercial clients, processes credit requests, and drives cross-sales; engages in community affairs to solicit new business; aims to meet/exceed sales goals in lending, deposits, revenue growth, profitability, and client acquisition.

experience.title: Sr. Business Banking Treasury Management Officer, Vice President & Senior Business Banker
experience.description: Combined Treasury Management and Business Banking duties; sold Treasury Management services; maintained existing businesses; created presentations on Treasury Management products; developed and implemented training for Business Bankers, Tellers and Financial Sales Consultants; implemented calling program for new clients; partnered with internal teams to uncover opportunities (wealth, merchant services, etc.); analyzed market conditions for services.

experience.title: Commercial Business Banking Relationship Manager, Assistant Vice President
experience.description: Generated and managed profitable loan and deposit portfolios and non-interest income from businesses with annual sales of $1MM-$25MM; developed long-term client relationships; nurtured cross-sell opportunities; provided credit solutions; achieved and exceeded sales goals in deposits, loans, revenue growth, profitability, and client acquisition.

experience.title: Senior Business Development Officer
experience.description: Identified and sold benefits to Select Employee Groups; developed strategic marketing plans; conducted on-site presentations; created proposals and negotiated terms; partnered with branches to uncover new business; coached and mentored staff; managed goal setting and training; assisted in developing annual budgets and growing regional new business.

experience.title: Branch Platform Banker
experience.description: Proactively initiated and managed long-term profitable banking relationships; oversaw branch operations, compliance, risk, ATM and cash management; developed deposit growth and increased fee income through collaboration with retail and business clients.

experience.title: Cash Management Analyst / Cash Management Officer
experience.description: Developed and implemented Cash Management products for Commercial Real Estate and Business Banking; managed large corporate client portfolios; acquired new cash management clients; maintained client relationships; reviewed cash management transactions and monthly analyses; supported pricing strategy.

experience.title: Cash Management Officer, Assistant Vice President
experience.description: Produced and executed various cash management solutions for business clients; sold Cash Management services; prepared presentations and proposals; resolved client issues; coordinated ATM deployments and cash management pricing; contributed to cost reduction and client-facing achievements.
